title: ignition-gazebo binaries conflict with ignition-gazebo2 binaries

content.raw:
# Prerequisites

* [X] Put an X between the brackets on this line if you have done all of the following:
    * Checked the Q&A board for common solutions: http://answers.gazebosim.org
    * Checked that your issue isn't already filed.
    * Checked that there is not already an Ignition package that provides the described functionality: https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs

# Description 

`ign-gazebo1` and `ign-gazebo2` both install unversioned symlinks to versioned binaries:

* /usr/bin/ign-gazebo
* /usr/bin/ign-gazebo-gui
* /usr/bin/ign-gazebo-server

This causes the `ignition-gazebo` and `ignition-gazebo2` debs to conflict with each other. I also noticed it during a failed bottle build:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_mojave&build=247)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_mojave/247/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_mojave/247/

# Steps to Reproduce

1. Add stable and nightly repo to apt sources on bionic
2. Install `ignition-gazebo` and `ignition-gazebo2`
3. Observe conflict

**Expected behavior:**  

Side-by-side install.

**Actual behavior:**

Conflict.

**Reproduces how often:** 

:100: %

# Versions

Major versions 1 and 2 conflict.

# Additional Information

ign-gazebo1 and ign-gazebo2 both install unversioned symlinks to versioned binaries:

  • /usr/bin/ign-gazebo
  • /usr/bin/ign-gazebo-gui

This causes the ignition-gazebo and ignition-gazebo2 debs to conflict with each other. I also noticed it during a failed bottle build:
